saying: There's always time to take a second look.
description: Boyd is a cranky gorilla villager from the Animal Crossing series. He first appeared in Doubutsu no Mori e+, and returned in the Welcome amiibo update for Animal Crossing: New Leaf. Boyd's catchphrase may be derived from "ooh ooh", an onomanopoea in English for a primate sound. His Japanese catchphrase is the Japanese equivalent of this.
